title: Customized Support Service Design and Operational Strategies for Distance Education Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational knowledge in language learning
context.additional_context: Focuses on designing personalized support services for adult learners aged 40+ engaging in self-directed language learning within a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three major types of issues in remote education environments and develop resolution strategies.
Learners can create and implement personalized learning plans to sustain self-directed learning.
Learners can explore, evaluate, and apply at least five language learning materials using digital platforms.
Learners can operate an online collaboration system with peer learners to perform project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
